getChargeTypeType

public String getChargeTypeType()
Gets the charge type's type (i.e. discount, cost, charge) Type value is defined in metadata data type cwt_pcdd.chargeTypeType.

Returns:
The charge type's type

getCurrency

public String getCurrency()
Gets the charge type currency.

Returns:
The charge type currency.

getDiscountPercentage

public Number getDiscountPercentage()
Gets the discount percentage if it's a discount of type "Percentage".

Returns:
Returns the discount percentage if it's a discount of percentage type. Otherwise returns 0;

getDiscountTargetCharge

public String getDiscountTargetCharge()
Deprecated. will be removed in 6, please replace with getTargetChargeOfChargeType

If the charge type of this CatalogItemCharge is a discount charge type, and if the discount charge type has a discount type of another charge, then this function will return the code of the charge type that determines the discount charge type. For example, if you have a CatalogItemCharge (or item charge) that is based on a discount charge type A, and in the definition of A, you specify that the "discount type" is charge type B, then this function will return the code of B. If the charge type of this CatalogItemCharge is not a discount charge type, or if it is and the discount charge type is not determined by another charge type, this function will return null. Gets the charge type of the discount target charge associated to this item charge

Returns:
The charge type code of the discount target charge

getFormulaName

public String getFormulaName()
Gets the formula name of the charge type

Returns:
The formula name of the charge type

getFrequency

public String getFrequency()
Gets the charge type frequency.

Returns:
The charge type frequency.

getLabel

public String getLabel(String lang)
Gets the label of this item charge given the language code. If language code is not provided, the catalog default language is used.

Parameters:
lang - The language code
Returns:
The item charge label

getName

public String getName()
Deprecated. This method returns the item charge code instead of name. Replaced by accessing code property directly.

Gets the name of this item charge

Returns:
The item charge name

getPricingType

public String getPricingType()
Gets the step pricing type of this item charge. The return value is defined in metadata data type cwt_pcdd.stepPricingType.

Returns:
The pricing type

getTargetChargeOfChargeType

public String getTargetChargeOfChargeType()
If the charge type of this CatalogItemCharge is a discount charge type, and if the discount charge type has a discount type of another charge, then this function will return the code of the charge type that determines the discount charge type. For example, if you have a CatalogItemCharge (or item charge) that is based on a discount charge type A, and in the definition of A, you specify that the "discount type" is charge type B, then this function will return the code of B. If the charge type of this CatalogItemCharge is not a discount charge type, or if it is and the discount charge type is not determined by another charge type, this function will return null.

Returns:
The charge type code of the discount target charge

getTargetChargeOfDiscount

public String getTargetChargeOfDiscount()
If this CatalogItemCharge is a discount (i.e. the base charge type is a discount charge type) then this function will return the target CatalogItemCharge that the discount is applied on. Otherwise, it will return null.

Returns:
The code of the CatalogItemCharge that this CatalogItemCharge (i.e. discount) applies on.

getTaxModel

public String getTaxModel()
Gets the tax model associated to this charge

Returns:
The tax model code

getValue

public Number getValue()
Gets the charge type amount or the discount amount if it's a discount with type "Amount".

Returns:
The charge type/discount amount.

isDisplayOnly

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean isDisplayOnly()
Checks if this charge is only for display purposes, i.e. it will not affect the pricing of the basket item

Returns:
Returns true if the charge is only for display purposes. Returns false otherwise.
